segments.text: I see the girl standing there, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she's waiting for the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's too focused on the cookie jar to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor could make her slip, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is being so careless, and she's just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like she's going to be really disappointed if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely oblivious to what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will ever get that cookie she's waiting for.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, but she seems to be in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't get hurt in all this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
